creator: dolachin@yahoo.com
text:
The Ant example in the HowTo is missing the following from the path:

<pathelement location="${tomcat.home}/bin/commons-logging-api.jar"/>

For someone who's new to Ant and tries to figure this out, this could be a 
barrier to entry.

Thank you.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text: Changing product Tomcat 4, per the URL you provide in your report.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Dola, you are using 5.5.x and reading the docs for 4.1.x

On 5.5.x jspc requires commons-logging-api.jar and the ant script included in
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/jasper-howto.html includes        
<fileset dir="${tomcat.home}/bin"><include name="*.jar"/></fileset> for that
very reason.


On 4.1.x jspc does not need commons-logging-api.jar, hence it is not referred to.
